original_title: Generación Espontánea: 10 Años de Diseño en México
overview: "Spontaneous Generation, 10 years of Design in Mexico" is a visual and investigative work that casually recounts the events of the creative environment over 10 years and at the same time generates and answers the viewer, the question: Where do you Are you currently finding Design in Mexico?
tagline: The first film documentary that recounts the path of Mexican Design and its evolution
title: Spontaneous Generation, 10 years of Design in Mexico
